sentences.en: Each corn kernel will make a loud pop when cooked.
sentences.cn: 每粒玉米在烹制时都会发出很响的啪的一声。

sentences.en: For all I know, there may be a kernel of truth in what he says.
sentences.cn: 据我所知，他的话可能有一点儿道理。

sentences.en: For her, he was the kernel of life, and to touch him alone was bliss.
sentences.cn: 他是她生活的核心, 碰他一下就是一种莫大的幸福.

sentences.en: Harvest losses increased 1 % per day of harvest delay after kernel moisture reached 10 %.
sentences.cn: 豆粒湿度达到10%后,收割每推延一天,损失就增1%.

sentences.en: Inside that massive frame the human being rattled in the corridors like a dry kernel.
sentences.cn: 在这个硕大无朋的空壳子里,人们象干果核一样在走廊里发出哗啷哗啷的声音.

sentences.en: Kernel updates take effect when you reboot the system.
sentences.cn: 内核升级需要重启系统才会生效.

sentences.en: The Agheila defile was kernel of the situation.
sentences.cn: 阿盖拉隘路是全局的核心.

sentences.en: The kernel of his problem is lack of money.
sentences.cn: 他的问题的核心是缺钱.

sentences.en: The kernel of that message was that peace must not be a source of advantage or disad-vantage for anyone.
sentences.cn: 那一信息的核心是和平绝不应该成为对任何人有利或不利的根源。

sentences.en: The kernel of that message was that peace must not be a source of advantage or disadvantage for anyone.
sentences.cn: 那一信息的核心是和平绝不应该成为对任何人有利或不利的根源。

sentences.en: The kernel regression method now is the most popular non - parametric estimation method.
sentences.cn: 核回归方法是比较常用的一种 非 参数估计方法.

sentences.en: This popcorn kernel's been stuck in my molars for two weeks!
sentences.cn: 这个爆米花核卡在我磨牙里两个星期了!

sentences.en: When their object is attained they fall off like empty hulls from the kernel.
sentences.cn: 当他们的目的达到以后,他们便凋谢零落,就象脱却果实的空壳一样.

sentences.en: Who will eat the kernel of the nut must break the shell.
sentences.cn: 欲吃坚果仁,必先破其壳.

sentences.en: You will need to have the kernel sources and the development environment installed!
sentences.cn: 您需要有kernel资源并安装开发环境!

trans.tran_en: the part of a nut or seed inside the shell, or the part inside the stone of some fruits
